Properties.NoActionMessage: This {{ Workflow.WorkflowType.WorkTerm }} does not currently require your attention.

Properties.Name: Process Requests Needing W1 Reminder
Properties.Description: The first reminder that's sent if someone in the baptism class has completed video one but not two OR completed video two and not three, and also the most recent activity is video one or two, respectively.

Properties.Name: Lava
Properties.Description: The to run.

Properties.Value:
{% sql %}
    /*

    The requests returned here need their first reminder that they've started the baptism class
    and can click the link to continue. "Started the baptism class" means they've finished
    video 1 but not finished video 2 OR they've finished video 2 but not video 3.
    
    */
    
    -- Get what the date is (no time) seven days ago
    DECLARE @now DATETIME;
    DECLARE @lastweek DATETIME;
    SET @now = GETDATE();
    SET @lastweek = CAST(FLOOR(CAST(DATEADD(DAY,-7,@now) as float)) as datetime);
    
    -- requests is a table that contains all of the Baptism Class connection requests that have
    -- the video 1 activity but not video 2
    WITH vid1requests AS (
    SELECT cr.*
      FROM ConnectionRequest cr
     WHERE cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.Id IN (SELECT cr1.Id
    				  FROM ConnectionRequest cr1
    					JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra1 ON (cr1.Id = cra1.ConnectionRequestId)
    				 WHERE cr1.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    				   AND cr1.ConnectionState = 0
    				   AND cra1.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo1ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.Id NOT IN (SELECT cr2.Id
    					  FROM ConnectionRequest cr2
    						JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    					 WHERE cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    					   AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    					   AND cra2.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo2ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
    ), vid2requests AS (
    	SELECT cr.*
      FROM ConnectionRequest cr
     WHERE cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.Id IN (SELECT cr1.Id
    				  FROM ConnectionRequest cr1
    					JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra1 ON (cr1.Id = cra1.ConnectionRequestId)
    				 WHERE cr1.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    				   AND cr1.ConnectionState = 0
    				   AND cra1.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo2ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.Id NOT IN (SELECT cr2.Id
    					  FROM ConnectionRequest cr2
    						JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    					 WHERE cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    					   AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    					   AND cra2.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo3ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
    )
    -- We then filter from those requests so we are left with only the ones whose most
    -- recent activity date was seven days ago, and checking to make sure we only have
    -- requests whose most recent activity type is video 1
    SELECT cra.Id, r.PersonAliasId, r.[Guid] AS crGuid, cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime
      FROM vid1requests r
    	JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra ON (r.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     GROUP BY r.[Guid], cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime, cra.Id, r.PersonAliasId
    HAVING CAST(FLOOR(CAST(MAX(cra.CreatedDateTime) as float)) as datetime) = @lastweek
       AND cra.Id IN (
    		SELECT cra.Id
      FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra
    	JOIN ConnectionRequest cr ON (cr.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     WHERE cra.CreatedDateTime = (SELECT MAX(cra2.CreatedDateTime)
    								FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra2
    									JOIN ConnectionRequest cr2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    							   WHERE cr2.Id = cr.Id
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo1ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       )
    
     UNION ALL
    
     SELECT cra.Id, r2.PersonAliasId, r2.[Guid] AS crGuid, cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime
      FROM vid2requests r2
    	JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra ON (r2.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     GROUP BY r2.[Guid], cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime, cra.Id, r2.PersonAliasId
    HAVING CAST(FLOOR(CAST(MAX(cra.CreatedDateTime) as float)) as datetime) = @lastweek
       AND cra.Id IN (
    		SELECT cra.Id
      FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra
    	JOIN ConnectionRequest cr ON (cr.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     WHERE cra.CreatedDateTime = (SELECT MAX(cra2.CreatedDateTime)
    								FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra2
    									JOIN ConnectionRequest cr2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    							   WHERE cr2.Id = cr.Id
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo2ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       )
     ORDER BY cra.CreatedDateTime DESC
{% endsql %}

{% assign workflowtypeid = Workflow | Attribute:'Week1ReminderWorkflow','Object' | Property:'Id' %}

{% for row in results %}
    {% assign person = row.PersonAliasId | PersonByAliasId %}
    {% workflowactivate workflowtype:'{{ workflowtypeid }}' Person:'{{ person.PrimaryAlias.Guid }}' ConnectionRequest:'{{ row.crGuid }}' %}
        
    {% endworkflowactivate %}
{% endfor %}

{{ results | Size }}

Properties.Name: Process Requests Needing W2 Reminder
Properties.Description: The second reminder that's sent if someone in the baptism class has completed video one but not two OR completed video two and not three, and also the most recent activity is the week one reminder.

Properties.Value:
{% sql %}
    /*
    
    The requests returned here need their first reminder that they've started the baptism class
    and can click the link to continue. "Started the baptism class" means they've finished
    video 1 but not finished video 2 OR they've finished video 2 but not video 3.
    
    */
    
    -- Get what the date is (no time) seven days ago
    DECLARE @now DATETIME;
    DECLARE @lastweek DATETIME;
    SET @now = GETDATE();
    SET @lastweek = CAST(FLOOR(CAST(DATEADD(DAY,-7,@now) as float)) as datetime);
    
    -- requests is a table that contains all of the Baptism Class connection requests that have
    -- the video 1 activity but not video 2
    WITH vid1requests AS (
    SELECT cr.*
      FROM ConnectionRequest cr
     WHERE cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.Id IN (SELECT cr1.Id
    				  FROM ConnectionRequest cr1
    					JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra1 ON (cr1.Id = cra1.ConnectionRequestId)
    				 WHERE cr1.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    				   AND cr1.ConnectionState = 0
    				   AND cra1.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo1ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.Id NOT IN (SELECT cr2.Id
    					  FROM ConnectionRequest cr2
    						JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    					 WHERE cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    					   AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    					   AND cra2.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo2ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
    ), vid2requests AS (
    	SELECT cr.*
      FROM ConnectionRequest cr
     WHERE cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.Id IN (SELECT cr1.Id
    				  FROM ConnectionRequest cr1
    					JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra1 ON (cr1.Id = cra1.ConnectionRequestId)
    				 WHERE cr1.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    				   AND cr1.ConnectionState = 0
    				   AND cra1.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo2ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.Id NOT IN (SELECT cr2.Id
    					  FROM ConnectionRequest cr2
    						JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    					 WHERE cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    					   AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    					   AND cra2.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo3ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }}) 
    )
    -- We then filter from those requests so we are left with only the ones whose most
    -- recent activity date was seven days ago, and checking to make sure we only have
    -- requests whose most recent activity type is video 1
    SELECT cra.Id, r.PersonAliasId, r.[Guid] AS crGuid, cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime
      FROM vid1requests r
    	JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra ON (r.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     GROUP BY r.[Guid], cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime, cra.Id, r.PersonAliasId
    HAVING CAST(FLOOR(CAST(MAX(cra.CreatedDateTime) as float)) as datetime) = @lastweek
       AND cra.Id IN (
    		SELECT cra.Id
      FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra
    	JOIN ConnectionRequest cr ON (cr.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     WHERE cra.CreatedDateTime = (SELECT MAX(cra2.CreatedDateTime)
    								FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra2
    									JOIN ConnectionRequest cr2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    							   WHERE cr2.Id = cr.Id
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'Reminder1ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       )
     --ORDER BY cra.CreatedDateTime DESC
    
     UNION ALL
    
     SELECT cra.Id, r2.PersonAliasId, r2.[Guid] AS crGuid, cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime
      FROM vid2requests r2
    	JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra ON (r2.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     GROUP BY r2.[Guid], cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime, cra.Id, r2.PersonAliasId
    HAVING CAST(FLOOR(CAST(MAX(cra.CreatedDateTime) as float)) as datetime) = @lastweek
       AND cra.Id IN (
    		SELECT cra.Id
      FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra
    	JOIN ConnectionRequest cr ON (cr.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     WHERE cra.CreatedDateTime = (SELECT MAX(cra2.CreatedDateTime)
    								FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra2
    									JOIN ConnectionRequest cr2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    							   WHERE cr2.Id = cr.Id
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'Reminder1ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       )
     ORDER BY cra.CreatedDateTime DESC

{% endsql %}

{% assign workflowtypeid = Workflow | Attribute:'Week2ReminderWorkflow','Object' | Property:'Id' %}

    {% assign person = row.PersonAliasId | PersonByAliasId %}
    {% workflowactivate workflowtype:'{{ workflowtypeid }}' Person:'{{ person.PrimaryAlias.Guid }}' ConnectionRequest:'{{ row.crGuid }}' %}
        
    {% endworkflowactivate %}
{% endfor %}

Properties.Name: Process Requests Needing W3 Reminder
Properties.Description: The third reminder that's sent if someone in the baptism class has completed video one but not two OR completed video two and not three, and also the most recent activity is the week two reminder.

Properties.Value:
{% sql %}
    /*
    
    The requests returned here need their first reminder that they've started the baptism class
    and can click the link to continue. "Started the baptism class" means they've finished
    video 1 but not finished video 2 OR they've finished video 2 but not video 3.

    					JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra1 ON (cr1.Id = cra1.ConnectionRequestId)
    				 WHERE cr1.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    				   AND cr1.ConnectionState = 0
    				   AND cra1.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo1ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.Id NOT IN (SELECT cr2.Id
    					  FROM ConnectionRequest cr2
    						JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    					 WHERE cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    					   AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    					   AND cra2.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo2ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})

    	SELECT cr.*
      FROM ConnectionRequest cr
     WHERE cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.Id IN (SELECT cr1.Id
    				  FROM ConnectionRequest cr1
    					JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra1 ON (cr1.Id = cra1.ConnectionRequestId)
    				 WHERE cr1.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    				   AND cr1.ConnectionState = 0
    				   AND cra1.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo2ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.Id NOT IN (SELECT cr2.Id
    					  FROM ConnectionRequest cr2
    						JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    					 WHERE cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    					   AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0

     GROUP BY r.[Guid], cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime, cra.Id, r.PersonAliasId
    HAVING CAST(FLOOR(CAST(MAX(cra.CreatedDateTime) as float)) as datetime) = @lastweek
       AND cra.Id IN (
    		SELECT cra.Id
      FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra
    	JOIN ConnectionRequest cr ON (cr.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     WHERE cra.CreatedDateTime = (SELECT MAX(cra2.CreatedDateTime)

    									JOIN ConnectionRequest cr2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    							   WHERE cr2.Id = cr.Id
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'Reminder2ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }}

     GROUP BY r2.[Guid], cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime, cra.Id, r2.PersonAliasId
    HAVING CAST(FLOOR(CAST(MAX(cra.CreatedDateTime) as float)) as datetime) = @lastweek
       AND cra.Id IN (
    		SELECT cra.Id
      FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra

     WHERE cra.CreatedDateTime = (SELECT MAX(cra2.CreatedDateTime)

Properties.Name: Process Requests Needing Inactivation
Properties.Description: If all three reminder have been ignored with no progress made in the course and it was seven days since the last reminder, this activity will inactivate the connection request and close the class workflow .

Properties.Value:
{% sql %}
    /*
    
    The requests returned here need their first reminder that they've started the baptism class
    and can click the link to continue. "Started the baptism class" means they've finished
    video 1 but not finished video 2 OR they've finished video 2 but not video 3.
    
    */
    
    -- Get what the date is (no time) seven days ago
    DECLARE @now DATETIME;
    DECLARE @lastweek DATETIME;
    SET @now = GETDATE();
    SET @lastweek = CAST(FLOOR(CAST(DATEADD(DAY,-7,@now) as float)) as datetime);
    
    -- requests is a table that contains all of the Baptism Class connection requests that have
    -- the video 1 activity but not video 2
    WITH vid1requests AS (
    SELECT cr.*
      FROM ConnectionRequest cr
     WHERE cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.Id IN (SELECT cr1.Id
    				  FROM ConnectionRequest cr1
    					JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra1 ON (cr1.Id = cra1.ConnectionRequestId)
    				 WHERE cr1.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    				   AND cr1.ConnectionState = 0
    				   AND cra1.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo1ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.Id NOT IN (SELECT cr2.Id
    					  FROM ConnectionRequest cr2
    						JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    					 WHERE cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    					   AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    					   AND cra2.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo2ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
    ), vid2requests AS (
    	SELECT cr.*
      FROM ConnectionRequest cr
     WHERE cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.Id IN (SELECT cr1.Id
    				  FROM ConnectionRequest cr1
    					JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra1 ON (cr1.Id = cra1.ConnectionRequestId)
    				 WHERE cr1.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    				   AND cr1.ConnectionState = 0
    				   AND cra1.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo2ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.Id NOT IN (SELECT cr2.Id
    					  FROM ConnectionRequest cr2
    						JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    					 WHERE cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
    					   AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    					   AND cra2.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'CompletedVideo3ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
    )
    -- We then filter from those requests so we are left with only the ones whose most
    -- recent activity date was seven days ago, and checking to make sure we only have
    -- requests whose most recent activity type is video 1
    SELECT cra.Id, r.PersonAliasId, r.[Guid], cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime
      FROM vid1requests r
    	JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra ON (r.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     GROUP BY r.[Guid], cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime, cra.Id, r.PersonAliasId
    HAVING CAST(FLOOR(CAST(MAX(cra.CreatedDateTime) as float)) as datetime) = @lastweek
       AND cra.Id IN (
    		SELECT cra.Id
      FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra
    	JOIN ConnectionRequest cr ON (cr.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     WHERE cra.CreatedDateTime = (SELECT MAX(cra2.CreatedDateTime)
    								FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra2
    									JOIN ConnectionRequest cr2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    							   WHERE cr2.Id = cr.Id
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'Reminder3ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       )
    
     UNION ALL
    
     SELECT cra.Id, r2.PersonAliasId, r2.[Guid], cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime
      FROM vid2requests r2
    	JOIN ConnectionRequestActivity cra ON (r2.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     GROUP BY r2.[Guid], cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId, cra.CreatedDateTime, cra.Id, r2.PersonAliasId
    HAVING CAST(FLOOR(CAST(MAX(cra.CreatedDateTime) as float)) as datetime) = @lastweek
       AND cra.Id IN (
    		SELECT cra.Id
      FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra
    	JOIN ConnectionRequest cr ON (cr.Id = cra.ConnectionRequestId)
     WHERE cra.CreatedDateTime = (SELECT MAX(cra2.CreatedDateTime)
    								FROM ConnectionRequestActivity cra2
    									JOIN ConnectionRequest cr2 ON (cr2.Id = cra2.ConnectionRequestId)
    							   WHERE cr2.Id = cr.Id
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionState = 0
    								 AND cr2.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }})
       AND cr.ConnectionState = 0
       AND cr.ConnectionOpportunityId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'OnlineBaptismClassConnectionOpportunity','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       AND cra.ConnectionActivityTypeId = {{ Workflow | Attribute:'Reminder3ActivityType','Object' | Property:'Id' }}
       )
     ORDER BY cra.CreatedDateTime DESC


{% endsql %}

{% assign workflowtypeid = Workflow | Attribute:'InactivatedClassCleanupWorkflow','Object' | Property:'Id' %}

{% for row in results %}
    {% assign person = row.PersonAliasId | PersonByAliasId %}
    {% workflowactivate workflowtype:'{{ workflowtypeid }}' Person:'{{ person.PrimaryAlias.Guid }}' ConnectionRequest:'{{ row.Guid }}' %}
        
    {% endworkflowactivate %}
{% endfor %}

{{ results | Size }}

Properties.Name: Online Baptism Class Connection Opportunity
Properties.Description: CHANGE: to the connection opportunity that represents your course

Properties.Name: Completed Video #1 Activity Type
Properties.Description: CHANGE: to the "Completed Baptism Video #1" Activity Type
